document_data.mainbody:
ragmar Deepscar was an orc warband leader of the kingdom of Many-Arrows in the late 15 century DR. He served under commander Vansi Bloodscar in their occupation of the River District of Neverwinter in the late 1470s DR.
Kragmar wore a personalized Belt of the Many Arrows. This girdle granted him limited regeneration abilities in addition to the powers of a regular Belt of the Many Arrows.
In the , Kragmar and fellow warband leaders Drogthu Elfeater and Lurg Bloodspear were in charge of coordinating attacks against the Neverwinter Guard. Finally, Scout Gaelen of the Guard sent an adventurer to infiltrate their barracks through a secret passage and eliminate all three of them.
